name: Sociale InnovatieFabriek
membership: we are member of EVPA, GSEN and The Shift
goal: The Social Innovation Factory is a networking organization that promotes, coaches and supports social innovations and social entrepreneurship in Flanders and Brussels.
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment
euInitiatives: We follow the Small Business Initiative and are actively contributing to the European Social Innovation Competition. Kaat Peeters, our general manager, is part of the GECES commission.
